column5: Our board sponsor Fishing World is having a big sale this week check out the announcements area for details.
Thanks Blake - I'll be sure to check that out! Looks like some good buys  Don

Excellent, I get paid tomorrow too!  I'll be there with bells on, well, maybe not bells but I'll be there.  Any idea Blake on what kinda stuff will be on sale?  You seem to have an inside connection there, so I'd figure you might know?
Check up above in the announcements Hooked - there is a list of stuff!  Don
i think i might stop in there when i return from Tennessee, which is after i go to BPS  (tomorrow) dont think fishingworld has the rod i am after... but some good deals on lures etc..
They don't have your rod - I checked when I was in there on the saturday before easter - unless they have gotten it in since.   Don
yea, i checked peters over the weekend, didnt have it there either, BPS is my hope lol if not ill order it from Cabs
Thx Don, I checked their site today and didn't see anything pertaining to a sale...., so I didn't check the link, plus my wife is down here talking to me now, distractions.....  thx again.
My pleasure Hooked - just leave some stuff for me!    LOL  Don

They have good stock of all specials but the earlier the better.  Just found out one day sale for today a Shimano reel one day only today on for $8.88 and also comes with line on the spool.  Limit 3 per person.

Thanks for posting this as well as the details in the Announcements. I did not see starting and ending dates for the sale and if the items listed were for the duration of the sale or on specific days.  Any idea?  (I know, I know why not just pick up the phone and call. That's the next step)
